name: Roxy
description: Deploy Your Self-Hosted Proxy to unblock websites through Heroku in one click

DOMAIN.description: The domain to proxy through heroku (only HOSTNAME e.g. example.com)

KEEP_DYNO_ALIVE.description: Should Roxy keep heroku free dyno alive (change value to 'true' if required)

HEROKU_APP_URL.description: Full Heroku App URL (required if KEEP_DYNO_ALIVE is true)
